Key Match Events: England's first T20 against Pakistan was abandoned due to rain without a ball being bowled
Post-Match Reflections: The abandonment means that Jofra Archer misses out on crucial game time to prove his fitness after a lengthy injury lay-off
Miscellaneous Highlights: The four-match series is set to continue at Edgbaston on Saturday before games next week in Cardiff and at the Oval
Others: England begin their T20 World Cup campaign against Scotland on June 4
